short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save, organize, and share your favorite links across devices. Cleeve makes bookmarking simple and intuitive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cleeve: Save Interesting Stuff for Later

Ever find something cool online but forget where you saw it? Cleeve's got your back.

With Cleeve, you can:
• Easily save any webpage or link
• Find your saved stuff easily, even if you forget the exact title
• Use it on your phone or computer - your links are everywhere you are

It's like having a super-organized friend who remembers everything you like on the internet.

Perfect for:
• That recipe you want to try next week
• The article you don't have time to read right now
• Podcasts you want to listen to later
• YouTube videos to watch when you have more time
• Gift ideas you stumble upon
• Anything else you want to remember

Cleeve is simple, fast, and keeps your browsing clutter-free. 

Give it a try - your future self will thank you!
